desc: Farad Token Swap Ethereum Smart Contract Wallet Address
warn.1: Please DO NOT send from Exchanger wallet as the token shall be sent to their address
warn.2: We will not be held responsible for any token that gets sent to the Exchanger wallet
inst.title: Contribution Settings
inst.min.contrib: Any swap less than 0.05 Ether shall be declined by the contract, and any excess gas used shall be returned to the sender address.
action.title: Farad Token Swap Ethereum Smart Contract Wallet Address
action.scan: Send your Ether to the address above, or scan the image shown if sending from mobile wallet.
